It seemed to lose a little of its air after the first week and we had to refill it.  All in all, good buy for summer fun.

column3: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
column8: As soon as summer hit and we knew we would not have a pool to go to for awhile, we searched and searched for an inflatable pool that would be durable and large enough for my 2 kids (10 & 12). This one had the best reviews and it truly is amazing for an inflatable pool. Sturdy, thick sides- not the flimsy vinyl that rips easily. It blows up very quickly and holds it's air great. It does take some time to fill with water- but that is because it's size is so big. Our kids loved this. They spent 4 hours straight in it the day we set it up- that made it worth it's price right there. We love it!
